amendment.description: To make available, with an offset, an additional $50,000,000 for Operation and Maintenance for Cooperative Threat Reduction.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2427 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 60. Record Vote Number: 311.

action.text: Amendment SA 2427 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S12389-12393, S12396-12397; text: CR S12389) To make available, with an offset, an additional $50,000,000 for Operation and Maintenance for Cooperative Threat Reduction.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2427 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 60. Record Vote Number: 311.
